Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether this location has a reduced accuracy reading.
Docs.value: True if the accuracy is reduced, false if the accuracy is not reduced.
Docs.remarks: This functionality only applies to iOS. Other platforms will always report false.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current speed in meters per second at the time when this location was determined.

remarks.para: Returns 0 or if not available. Otherwise the value will range between 0-360.
Requires to be or better and may not be returned when calling .
